page.title: 02NEWTON AYCLIFFE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: Newton Aycliffe Town Centre is a pedestrianised area. The types of shops in the town centre are many and varied. There are chemists, grocers, sports shops, shoe shops, clothes shops and supermarkets. There are two Chinese restaurants and two video shops where customers can hire video recordings of films. There are solicitors' offices, estate agents, council offices, banks, building societies, a post office, travel agents, opticians, doctors' and dentists' surgeries. Also in the town centre there is a public library, health centre, police and fire stations and a recreation centre. Adjacent to the town centre is the parish church of St. Clare.
